titles.title: Maritime Fuel Tax Parity Act
Maritime Fuel Tax Parity Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the exemption from the excise tax on alternative motorboat fuels sold as supplies for vessels or aircraft to include certain vessels serving only one coast.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Maritime Fuel Tax Parity Act
This bill extends the exemption from the excise tax on motor boat or motor vehicle fuels sold or used as supplies for certain vessels or aircraft engaged in trade between U.S. Atlantic or Pacific ports.
